name: Galaxy-Eyes Tachyon Drill Dragon
text: This card is treated as "Galaxy-Eyes Tachyon Dragon" while it is face-up on the field. If this card is Xyz Summoned: you can add 1 "Tachyon" card from your deck to your hand. You can detach 1 Xyz material from this card: Target 1 Dragon monster you control; until the end of this turn, double its ATK and if you do, it can make up to 2 attacks this turn and if it attacks a defense position monster, inflict double piercing battle damage to your opponent. You can only activate each effect of "Galaxy-Eyes Tachyon Drill Dragon" once per turn.
